title: Wife doesn't want to listen to long lectures or read books, wants interactive sessions Assimalhakeem
transcript: says his wife doesn't want to read long books and doesn't want to listen to long lectures and she wants some interactive live sessions so what to do i don't know you have to enlist your uh wife in some islamic universities that are online there are a lot of interactive um not interactive there are online live sessions so all the scholars or the daddies they have their weekly classes or more than a class a day which are online and you get to post your questions and and she gets an answer to that inshaallah
